sentences.sentence: Or to ravish me, and I'm sure.
sentences.translation: 或是为了迷惑我，我敢肯定。

sentences.sentence: Following a perfume trail to its source, male wasps in Australia ravish a king spider orchid.
sentences.translation: 在澳大利亚，有一群雄蜂随香寻源，强占了一株王蜘蛛兰。

sentences.sentence: All we have left is paroxysm, and when it subsides, there will be just one wisp of smoke. Our inner fire will ravish all.
sentences.translation: 我们所剩下的只有身体震颤，当它平息的时候，只有一缕轻烟。我们内心的火焰会吞噬一切。
